title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
ingredients: 12 oz spaghetti, 1/2 cup olive oil, 8 garlic cloves, 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes, salt, black pepper, 1/4 cup chopped parsley, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions, reserve 1 cup pasta water and drain. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat, add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1-2 minutes. Add cooked spaghetti to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and toss to coat. Add reserved pasta water as needed to create a sauce. Stir in chopped parsley and grated Parmesan, serve.

title: Banana Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tbsp sugar, 2 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 egg, 1 cup milk, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, 2 ripe bananas
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In another bowl, mix egg, milk, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract. Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients, and stir until just combined. Mash bananas and fold them into the batter. Preheat a non-stick griddle or frying pan over medium heat. Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake and cook until bubbles appear on the surface, flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes. Serve with your favorite toppings.
